alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Haakon, southwestern Ziebach, east central Meade and northeastern Pennington Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Plainview, or 37 miles south of Faith, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Howes around 340 PM MDT. Bridger around 345 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Takini. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach
